title: NBA Draftapalooza Part 1: Kyrie Drama, Fake KD Trades, and Last-Minute Pre-Draft Thoughts With Ryen Russillo, Kevin O’Connor and Chris Ryan
description:
The Ringer’s Bill Simmons is joined by Ryen Russillo, Kevin O’Connor, and Chris Ryan to discuss news that Kevin Durant is considering his options when it comes to his future with the Nets, what the market for Kyrie would be like, the most fun trade destinations for KD, and why Bill has once again changed his mind about who the Magic should take with the no. 1 pick.

Host: Bill Simmons
Guest: Ryen Russillo, Kevin O’Connor, and Chris Ryan
Producer: Kyle Crichton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
